post_title: T206 Chase Blue Portrait 360-450 Piedmont Fact. 42
post_content:
T206 Chase Blue Portrait 360-450 Piedmont Fact. 42

A very, very rare front/back combo.

Crease free with a clean back, some front staining which might come out??

$1,800 Check, MO or Zelle

That, is a beautiful card.
GLWS.
